t: Sales collapse forces 'woke' mega-brand to make humiliating U-turn and relist on Amazon | Daily Mail Online
s: 4 days ago - America's most popular shoe is coming back to Amazon. After a five-year hiatus, Nike shoes, clothing, and accessories are returning to the e-commerce giant. The athletic brand swiped its products from the platform in 2019, as part of a push to sell more directly to consumers.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 18 hours ago - Amazon opened its tenth physical bookstore in 2017; media speculation at the time suggested that Amazon planned to eventually roll out 300 to 400 bookstores around the country. All of its locations were closed in 2022 along with other retail locations under the "Amazon 4-Star" brand.

t: The Life and Death of the Amazon Brands
